description:
Do you like being late to appointments, work, or any other place you have to visit?

Do you like driving to one part of town, only to go back where you came from 20 minutes later?

It doesn't matter if you're self-employed, work for a small business, or a big company, the time you're wasting is YOURS. 

Unlike ANY OTHER routing or navigation system, Route4Me INSTANTLY re-sequences your ENTIRE route in the correct order, so that you don't zig-zag across town.

Even IF your employer reimburses you for gas or per stop visited, use the time you save driving around for a longer lunch, get off work early, watch a movie, or spend time with your family.

--------> DOWNLOAD ROUTE4ME FOR FREE NOW <-----------


Route4Me's navigation app makes multi-destination trips quick and easy. Unlike most navigation systems, Route4Me gives you the most optimal route when you need to go more than one place. Save time, money, and miles by optimizing your routes. 

The application is great for road warriors, real estate agents, deliveries, technicians, shuttles, van or taxi pickups, or any other type of multi-destination routes. Enter addresses, zip codes, cities, states, or airport codes and Route4me will optimize the route for you. You can even share the routes to someone else for free.

Route4Me presents your route in multiple formats and offers a map interface.



Reviews from the Experts
--------------------------------------
***YAHOO!***
Route4Me is an online service that tells you the most efficient route to complete all your errands; just put in the addresses, and let it work its magic.

***WALL STREET JOURNAL***
Route4me optimizes your route when traveling to multiple destinations, allowing you to enter up to 200 addresses per route. Route4me claims that routes are usually 25-35% shorter after being optimized.

***CNN MONEY***
This paid app maps out routes for your multi-stop trip. Instead of driving back and forth across town, or unknowingly taking the long way to run errands, you can map the fastest or shortest path with Route4Me.

***USA TODAY***
The app could be particularly helpful for small business owners who regularly make multiple deliveries in a single trip.

***BNET***
Need to visit our vendor and a few clients this afternoon? You could eyeball the map to pick the best route, or you could do it the scientific way. Here’s a Web site that will find the most efficient route to all your destinations quickly and easily — complete with driving directions.




Flexible Account Types
--------------------------------------
*Route4Me is free for personal use for up to 10 routes per month 

OR for Business Users

*Link it to your Route4Me.com if you already have a web account
*You can optimize an unlimited number of routes of any size for $5/month or only $40/year (a $20 savings!)
*No long term fees or setup costs! Your monthly plan will auto-renew monthly or yearly until you cancel it at any time you want

releaseNotes: Enhancements related to enterprise account integration for mobile business asset tracking in background mode, and optimizations which permit internationalized text data to appear in the route custom data sections.
